title: A strappado for the Diuell Epigrams and satyres alluding to the time, with diuers measures of no lesse delight. By Misosukos, to his friend Philokrates.
author: Brathwaite, Richard, 1588?-1673.
publisher: Printed by I. B[eale] for Richard Redmer and are to be sold at the west dore of Pauls at the Starre,
notes: Misosukos = Richard Brathwait, who is named on the leaf following the title page.
"Loues labyrinth: or the true-louers knot" has separate pagination, and dated title page naming Richard Brathwait as author; register is continuous.
A note at the foot of leaf Z4 (signed "[par.]") directs it and Z5 to be bound after part 1; the pagination above reflects this arrangement.
Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
